credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions: H x Diam: 54.6 x 17.8 cm (21 1/2 x 7 in.)
title: Monumental scenic vellum
description: White clay body, thrown.  Elongated-ovoid cylindrical body with short raised neck; no foot.  Underglaze slip decorated all around body with landscape scene:  trees and brush in foreground; lake in middle ground, and trees in low hills in background.  Predominantly blues and greens, sky shading to pale yellow and peach.  Lower body is light green.  Allover vellum glaze; crackle.  Interior and bottom glazed.
name: Vase
